title: sAhasika danujahara
sahitya:
sAhasika danujahara mAdhava nirupamatama sarasija madahara suvadana


anupallavi

  dEha virAjita kOmala saurabha candana dEvarAja natapAda sarOjanAbha jagadIshvara


caraNam 1    kALiya phaNa krta nartana kAma dhrta vara maNDana 
sALaka niTila taTAncita shankara vidhi paripUjita
    caraNam 2    gOkula kamala dinEshvara ghOra bhava bhaya vinAshaka 
shrI shuka sanakAdi vicintitapada parapuruSa
    caraNam 3    kEsha lasita sumamAlika kEshava brta karuNArasa 
nAshita sujana manOmala nRada mukha hrdayAlaya
